name: Ice and fire (IceDev Studio)
description:
Ice And Fire : Survival Edition is game inspired by blezsqwid's ice and fire game. this game is a game that requires our ice character to escape from the approaching fire 

And I want to say

"If you like it keep playing, if you don't like it don't play"

New update At 1.0.1:

-add Timer

-Game optimization

-Blood can be reduced

-and more
